title: The Inaugural Red Bull Hardline Australia Race is On Tomorrow!
content:
Ready to watch the world’s best mountain bikers tackle a brand new course with some of the biggest features around? Us too. The first-ever Red Bull Hardline Australia is on, and the finals will be broadcast tomorrow afternoon.

If you’ve been following along on YouTube with coverage from Bernard Kerr, Matt Jones (straight off of Dark Fest!), and others, it’s been exciting to watch the Hardline Australia course come together. It’s also been hard to believe some of the features the course builders have constructed which will make for some very entertaining footage come race day.

How to Watch Red Bull Hardline Australia

You can tune in tomorrow on Red Bull TV at 2 PM EST to watch the event live from Maydena Bike Park in Tasmania. You can also watch on YouTube above.
